.. _tutorial:

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Create your first bot
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

In this chapter, you'll create a brand new bot, which will use all the
botogram capabilities. Be sure to have botogram installed, otherwise be sure to
check the ":ref:`install`" chapter.
